actions.description: The phisarazu makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Scintillating Spray if available.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target has the poisoned condition until the start of the phisarazu's next turn.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The phisarazu expels shimmering webs in a 60-foot cone. Creatures and objects in that area are outlined by the glittering webs for 1 minute, during which time they emit dim light for 10 feet and can't benefit from the invisible condition. Additionally, creatures in that area must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Scintillating Spray (Recharge 5-6)

name: Phisarazu Spyder-Fiend [VEoR]
resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: The phisarazu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The phisarazu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb

specialTraits.description: When in contact with a web, the phisarazu knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
specialTraits.name: Web Sense

specialTraits.description: The phisarazu ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
specialTraits.name: Web Walker
